qas.question: What is the address for The New York City Fire Department headquarters?
Which island is home to the Fire academy in NYC?
Which borough of NYC is home to the The New York City Fire Department headquarters?
What is the street address of the New York Fire Department headquarters?
In what borough is the FDNY headquartered?
Where is the fire department's training academy located?
What is the street address of the Bureau of Fire Communications alarm office in Brooklyn?

context: The FDNY headquarters is located at <a0_0><a3_0>9 MetroTech Center<a3_0/><a0_0/> in Downtown <a2_0><a4_0>Brooklyn<a4_0/><a2_0/>, and the FDNY Fire Academy is located on <a1_0><a5_0>Randalls Island<a5_0/><a1_0/>. There are three Bureau of Fire Communications alarm offices which receive and dispatch alarms to appropriate units. One office, at <a6_0>11 Metrotech Center<a6_0/> in Brooklyn, houses Manhattan/Citywide, Brooklyn, and Staten Island Fire Communications. The Bronx and Queens offices are in separate buildings.
